summary: AN ORDINANCE adding a new subsection E to Section 4.36.270 and amending subsection D of Section 4.36.230 of the Seattle Municipal Code to authorize payment of a deceased member's accumulated contributions directly to an heir in estates being settled without probate, and amending subsection E of Section 4.36.230 to authorize payment of a disability retirement allowance to a surviving spouse who through an oversight is not named as a beneficiary.
